title: How to Put Wipers in Service Mode
description: A customer wants to replace their windshield wipers but cannot lift them from the windshield because they are tucked under the hood.

tasks.description: Identify the vehicle model, as the procedure can vary.
Access the knowledge base to find the procedure for activating 'Wiper Service Mode'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the instructions: 'Turn ignition on, then off, and within 3 seconds, press and hold the wiper stalk down'.

tasks.description: Clearly explain the procedure to the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions, and the customer successfully puts the wipers into the raised service position.
